description:
Andrew showed up on my doorstep just after his 18th birthday. A baby!
I thought here was a cute innocent young guy, but it turns out Andrew really knows the ropes..literally!
He's not shy one bit, and loves to be naked (and show off his amazing ass!). Not mild-mannered, he informed me he loves bondage, domination, biting, being tied up, and candle wax. There is apparently a fine art and technique to applying it.
Hmmmm...a boy that likes to be tied up. Wonder what I could have 'em do?
Love workin with him. He loves sex and though he is straight, he's loves giving and getting attention from both sexes.
title: Andrew Callen - Solo
